page.title: 05Plas Panton Farm
page.content: Plas Panton is an upland farm in Bylchau.The farmer lives there with his wife and three children.The farm house is about three hundred years old .Plas Panton has two hundred and sixty acres and one tractor.He has forteen cows and five hundred sheep.We have two ducks.The three of the main products are beef,lamb and wool.The only one who works on the farm is my father.My fathers name is Owen Ellis Williams.We have four machines.We shear about the middle of June.My mothers name is Irene Williams.
